Module io.inverno.mod.base
Package io.inverno.mod.base.converter

Interface PrimitiveEncoder<To>

Type Parameters:
To - the encoded type
All Superinterfaces:
Encoder<Object,To>
All Known Subinterfaces:
JoinablePrimitiveEncoder<To>, ObjectConverter<From>
All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteBufConverter, StringCompositeConverter, StringConverter
public interface PrimitiveEncoder<To> extends Encoder<Object,To>

An object encoder providing primitive bindings to encode primitive and common types.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
See Also:
